Hey everyone! I don't really have any new updates for this version of Grok AI Chat, but I just wanted to ask, have you ever wondered why I have never added the model grok-code-fast-1 as a usable model in Grok AI Chat? 

Well, a small part of it may be because it does not have any access to the Agentic Tools, or because the model alias does not support "-latest" at the end, but the biggest reason is that ever since that model came out, I have been dreaming of making one thing: A full HTML code editor that is powered by grok-code-fast-1.

And I'm very proud to announce that today, I have created just that! I just published my brand new Grok Code shortcut, which functions as a full multi-tab syntax-highlighted AI-powered code editor, right in your browser! You can find it at the link https://routinehub.co/shortcut/24965/. I hope you guys enjoy!

P.S. Grok 4.20 is coming to the xAI API soon! I will definitely try to add it to this shortcut immediately as soon as it does ;)
